package example;

public class Application
{

  //------------------------
  // STATIC VARIABLES
  //------------------------

  private static Application theInstance = null;

  //------------------------
  // MEMBER VARIABLES
  //------------------------

  //------------------------
  // CONSTRUCTOR
  //------------------------

  private Application()
  {}

  public static Application getInstance()
  {
    if(theInstance == null)
    {
      theInstance = new Application();
    }
    return theInstance;
  }

  //------------------------
  // INTERFACE
  //------------------------

  public void delete()
  {}

}
